data.description: Covers MEMR’s post-commissioning oversight, including environmental condition compliance, operational status reporting, and spot audits of license adherence.

notes.informal_notes: Monitoring depends on capacity and political priority. In practice, many BESS projects operate with minimal follow-up unless complaints are filed or problems emerge.
notes.symbolic_scaffold: Post-permit monitoring sustains the project’s legitimacy — especially relevant for international funders and ESG-linked financing vehicles.
notes.feedback_structure: Non-compliance often leads to informal warnings before formal action. Enforcement varies across regions and technologies.
failure_modes: Failure to submit required compliance documents
Silent permit condition violations (e.g. no waste battery tracking)
